posts.name: Espino
posts.cooked: We were trying 3D experience all morning but we didn´t like the interface and it consumes a lot of resources of the computer. What solution are you using instead of Grabcad? We considering  to try Google Drive, but we know it is not the most optmized option.

posts.name: EricH
posts.cooked:
The first thing most folks here will tell you is “Onshape”.

But the first thing I’ll ask is: what CAD program do you currently use?

posts.name: tim-tim
posts.cooked: Cloud storage, PDM, project management, and design reviews. Together for the first time. See how a cloud-based PDM system can get your engineering team moving faster! If your team is on SolidWorks, GrabCAD, Altium, or another CAD system, Bild can...

link_counts.title: Bild | Cloud PDM for Modern Teams

posts.cooked: Seconded Great for Inventor, but they also claim to be good for Solidworks

posts.name: tim-tim
posts.cooked:
We use it for SolidWorks.

You can use it for any file type (to my knowledge). We keep PDFs, word/excel, pictures, CAD, print/CAM, etc files

posts.name: Espino
posts.cooked: could you pass me the link, please? I couldn´t find it

posts.name: tim-tim
posts.cooked: No. They are familiar with FIRST and offering the edu version to us and other teams for free.
There’s no link for an edu version. You have to reach out to support ( contact@getbild.com ). The person that granted the edu version for us is Will Spencer. He’s great; super helpful and fast.
